body.p: ∏ provides add-on libraries and frameworks for employing encryption and related security features in your Smalltalk applications.

The Security frameworks are provided in a set of parcels. Use the Parcel Manager to browse the Security folder, and to load the desired components. Additional encryption functions are mostly provided by the Xstreams-Xtras parcel located in /contributed/Xtreams.
For complete documentation, refer to the Security Guide.
